title: Магия сердца
overview: After her mother's death, Mila becomes her father's support both at home and in business. But the family situation gets tense when her father gets close to the fortune teller Albina. Mila doesn't believe in the sincerity of Albina's feelings and, having quarreled with her father on this basis, decides to start an independent life. She leaves the family business and accidentally meets the charming psychic Sergei, hoping that thanks to his abilities she will expose her stepmother. Having become close to Sergei, Mila realizes that she has fallen in love, although she has a fiancé... Nevertheless, the young people begin to work together and become a real team. And Sergei's gift really helps to shed light on the circumstances of Mila's life and her loved ones.
